title: EP 36: Who Raised You?: The TK Kirkland Episode
itunes:title: EP 36: Who Raised You?: The TK Kirkland Episode
description:
Friend of the show TK Kirkland stops through TGC to discuss everything from Colin Kaepernick's and Black history, to dealing with woman when your locked up, this episode is definitely game orientated. Press play and leave a comment. Make sure you check out TK Kirkland's Podcast on Loud Speaker's Network. Also, go get that new Gangster Chronicle merchandise. Enter the code 310562 to save 10% Support the show. See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
